value: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian

The soča river is famous for its white-water rafting or kayaking possibilities. There are many companies in Bovec with offers for kayaking, rafting, canyoning or hydrospeed. A kayak trip including all material will cost about €40 per person for a 1-2 hour trip. There are plenty of mountain biking (bike rentals for approx. €20/day) and hiking trails along the mountain that borders the city. Topographical trail maps can be purchased at the tourist information center for €7.

There is a cable car that runs up the Kanin mountain but check the schedule as it doesn't run in the off season.

Offers whitewater rafting,  canyoning, kayaking, hydrospeeding.  Discounts available if you choose to do more than one option with them.  Very helpful, friendly, English speaking staff.
content=This company has a lot of experience, with excellent staff.

Focusing more on small group trips and nice familiar atmosphere. Offers Whitewater kayak courses from beginner to advance level, easy Kayak Trips for beginners, and Family rafting trips for families with small kids from the age of 4.
content=Apparently their 200 seats are not enough, since we had to wait for half an hour for a free table. Excellent food, staff speak their languages, and not too expensive.
content=Located just 80m from town center on a calm location with an astoning view to the surrounding mountains. It offers a variety of drinks and a Free internet (WiFi) access to guests.

content=Apartments Jojojo offers comfortable accommodation in Bovec. Parking available in fornt of the house. Free WiFi internet access to guest of apartments. Each apartment has two bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom with shower&WC, large living room, cable TV, ....
content=Just like the two campsites next door, Liza is crowded with kayaks and rafts. Has a nice bar that also serves pizzas and other food. Free WiFi.

Run by a very friendly older woman, this apartment has 2 comfortable bedrooms, fully equiped bathroom, livingroom and fully equipped kitchen.  A great place to spend a few days!
content=Bovec kot 33 accommodations offers unique experience of Bovec. Free parking, Free WiFi. Bathroom, shower, kitchen, tv from 17,50/person/night
content=Nice hotel with rooms with nice views towards the nearby mountains
directions=Turn from the main road at florist shop Amak near center of Bovec, and continue 200 meters.
content=New confortable apartment (80m2) for 6 persons. Quiet location near center of Bovec. Spacious living room with balcony and internet corner, 2 bedrooms, garden.
